verses.plain: My heart is inditing a good matter: I speak of the things which I have made touching the king: my tongue is the pen of a ready writer.

tokens.t: My heart is inditing a good matter: I speak of the things which I have made touching the king: my tongue
the pen of a ready writer.

verses.plain: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.

tokens.t: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.

verses.plain: Gird thy sword upon thy thigh, O most mighty, with thy glory and thy majesty.

tokens.t: Gird thy sword upon
thigh, O
mighty, with thy glory and thy majesty.

verses.plain: And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness and righteousness; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things.

tokens.t: And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness
righteousness; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things.

verses.plain: Thine arrows are sharp in the heart of the king’s enemies; whereby the people fall under thee.

tokens.t: Thine arrows
sharp in the heart of the king’s enemies;
the people fall under thee.

verses.plain: Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre.

tokens.t: Thy throne, O God,
for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom
a right sceptre.

verses.plain: Thou lovest righteousness, and hatest wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.

tokens.t: Thou lovest righteousness, and hatest wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.

verses.plain: All thy garments smell of myrrh, and aloes, and cassia, out of the ivory palaces, whereby they have made thee glad.

tokens.t: All thy garments
of myrrh, and aloes,
cassia, out of the ivory palaces, whereby they have made thee glad.

verses.plain: Kings’ daughters were among thy honourable women: upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir.

tokens.t: Kings’ daughters
among thy honourable women: upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir.

verses.plain: Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father’s house;

tokens.t: Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father’s house;

verses.plain: So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty: for he is thy Lord; and worship thou him.

tokens.t: So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty: for he
thy Lord; and worship thou him.

verses.plain: And the daughter of Tyre shall be there with a gift; even the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour.

tokens.t: And the daughter of Tyre
with a gift;
the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour.

verses.plain: The king’s daughter is all glorious within: her clothing is of wrought gold.

tokens.t: The king’s daughter
all glorious within: her clothing
of wrought gold.

verses.plain: She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework: the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee.

tokens.t: She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework: the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee.

verses.plain: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought: they shall enter into the king’s palace.

tokens.t: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought: they shall enter into the king’s palace.

verses.plain: Instead of thy fathers shall be thy children, whom thou mayest make princes in all the earth.

tokens.t: Instead of thy fathers shall be thy children, whom thou mayest make princes in all the earth.

verses.plain: I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations: therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever.

tokens.t: I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations: therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever.

footnotes.text: is inditing: Heb. boileth, or, bubbleth up
ride…: Heb. prosper thou, ride thou
